stringToObject

protected Object stringToObject(String value,
                                Type convertTo,
                                Map<String,String> attributes,
                                String expression)
                         throws ConversionException,
                                ConverterStateException
Description copied from class: AbstractGlobalConverter
Converts the single String value to an Object.

Specified by:
stringToObject in class AbstractGlobalConverter
Parameters:
value - The String value to convert.
convertTo - The type to convert to.
attributes - The dynamic attributes to assist in the conversion.
expression - The full path to the expression that is causing the conversion.
Returns:
The converted value.
Throws:
ConversionException - If the conversion failed.
ConverterStateException - if the converter didn't have all of the information it needed to perform the conversion.

Description copied from class: AbstractGlobalConverter
Converts a String array to a single Object (not an array of Objects). Support for this method is uncommon.
